data.title: The Bell Tower on 34th
data.meta_description: See area hotels, restaurants, churches, airports and other points of interest near The Bell Tower on 34th, conveniently located in the heart of Houston, TX in the Garden District.
data.text:
At The Bell Tower on 34th, we know how important it is to have a great stay in the area. That's why we created this map to help you find hotels, restaurants, churches and airports near us. Whether you're looking for an exciting night out or a cozy place to rest your head for the night, you can take advantage of our convenient location to access some of the best services around.

We put together this map of the immediate area around our venue for you and your guests. For convenience, please feel free to share the link.

To locate the filter on the map and toggle on/off layers for local attractions, Area Hotels, Restaurants, Churches, and Airports near The Bell Tower on 34th, you'll need to look for three lines at the top left of the map.

Clicking on these lines should bring up a menu with all available filters. You can choose from Area Hotels, Restaurants, Churches Airports and Local Attractions to view or hide specific layers. Once you have chosen your desired filters from this menu, they will be visible in your map view around The Bell Tower on 34th.

Thank you for using our mapping service!

If there is anything else we can help with please contact us. Have a great day!
